00029 class Segment : public Element {
00030    public:
00031       enum SegmentType {
00032             SegClef, SegKeySig, SegTimeSig, SegBeginRepeat, SegChordRest
00033             };
00034    private:
00035       SegmentType _type;
00036       std::vector<Element*> _elist;      // size = staves * VOICES;
00037       std::vector<LyricsList> _lyrics;   // size = staves
00038 
00039       void init();
00040 
00041    public:
00042       Segment(Measure*);
00043       Segment(const Segment&);
00044       virtual Element* clone() const { return new Segment(*this); }
00045       Segment(Measure*, int t);
00046 
00047       Segment* next() const    { return (Segment*)Element::next(); }
00048       Segment* prev() const    { return (Segment*)Element::prev(); }
00049       Segment* next1() const;
00050       Segment* prev1() const;
00051 
00052       Element* element(int track) const             { return _elist[track];    }
00053       void removeElement(int track);
00054       void setElement(int track, Element* el);
00055       LyricsList* lyricsList(int track)             { return &_lyrics[track];  }
00056       const LyricsList* lyricsList(int track) const { return &_lyrics[track];  }
00057       void setLyrics(int staff, Lyrics* l);
00058 
00059       Measure* measure() const       { return (Measure*)parent(); }
00060       double x() const               { return _pos.x();           }
00061       void setX(double v)            { _pos.setX(v);              }
00062 
00063       std::vector<Element*>* elist() { return &_elist; }
00064 
00065       SegmentType type() const       { return _type; }
00066       void setType(SegmentType t)    { _type = t;    }
00067 
00068       void insertStaff(int staff);
00069       void removeStaff(int staff);
00070 
00071       virtual void add(Element*);
00072       virtual void remove(Element*);
00073 
00074       virtual void draw(Painter& p) const;
00075       void sortStaves(std::list<int>& src, std::list<int>& dst);
00076       };
